title: 如何隐藏服务器进入和退出信息
author: xiao——qi

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D 看下这个插件

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content: 给予玩家或者整个权限组essentials.silentjoin和essentials.silentquit两条权限

replies.author: 沉默-钟
replies.txt_content:
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/disable-join-message.4138/
这个插件不错哦 1.12.2亲测可用~
